description.text: The ability to mow down scavangers and hunters
The ability to quickly dispatch troopers, raiders, marauders, and commisar

The ability to kill medium bots (scout striders, berserkers, devastators) with ammo efficiency
The ability to kill large bugs (chargers) safely and effortlessly
The ability to kill large bots (hulks, tanks) safely and effortlessly

The ability to damage and kill huge bots (factory striders, cannon turrets) from the front

The ability to damage and destroy heavy objectives (AA emplacements).
